newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Safeway cut to hold.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Safeway cut to hold.

text.p: -- Prudential Securities said it downgraded Safeway Inc to hold from buy.
-- Additional details of the rating change were not immediately available.

-- On Thursday, Safeway said a strike by its union in the Alberta, Canada area will hurt its sales and operating results for the duration of the strike. The company said it was unable to determine the extent of the potential financial impact.
-- Safeway also posted first quarter earnings of $0.51 a share on sales of $4.07 billion, up from earnings of $0.40 a share on sales of $3.88 billion.
